definition: modern history (for China, from the Opium Wars until the fall of the Qing Dynasty, i.e. mid-19th to early 20th century)
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: China was indeed humiliated by Western powers in its modern history.
sentences.chinese: 在近代史当中，中国的确受到了西方列强的侮辱。

sentences.english: In China's modern history, Tan Sitong's heroic death may be the most exciting event.
sentences.chinese: 谭嗣同的慷慨成仁是中国近代史上最激动人心的华章。

sentences.english: It has achieved the biggest disclosure of classified information in modern history.
sentences.chinese: 它已经成功的公布了近代史上的最大量的机密信息。

sentences.english: Sheng Xuanhuai is an quite influential character in Chinese modern history.
sentences.chinese: 盛宣怀是中国近代史上颇具影响的人物。

sentences.english: Modern history is concerned with the future as well as with the past.
sentences.chinese: 近代史不仅兴过去有关，也兴未来有关。

sentences.english: Greece has, of course, been producing wines for thousands of years, but in more recent times its reputation has sunk low with the incorrect assumption that all roads lead to retsina.
sentences.chinese: 希腊酿酒历史悠久，但在近代史中名望较低。

sentences.english: Documents from Turfan and Dunhuang shared similar fate in modern history of China.
sentences.chinese: 吐鲁番和敦煌文献在近代史上拥有相似的历史经历。

sentences.english: An linke with the modern Chinese history is helpful to the study of Chinese revolution.
sentences.chinese: 懂得一下中国近代史，对研究中国反动是有扶植的。

sentences.english: Liberia's recent history is marked by years of conflict and political instability.
sentences.chinese: 利比里亚近代史的显著特点是数年的冲突和政治动荡。

sentences.english: 1：What are the biggest election landslides in modern history?
sentences.chinese: 近代史上，哪几次大选取得了最大的压倒性胜利？

sentences.english: Years later, he moved to Beijing to study pre-modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 多年后他来到北京研究中国近代史。

sentences.english: Feng Guifen was a great thinker in modern China history.
sentences.chinese: 冯桂芬是中国近代史上一位伟大的思想家。

sentences.english: Modern world history was not the history of capitalist society.
sentences.chinese: 世界近代史不能同资本主义史画等号。

sentences.english: Situation in China's modern history at the big warlords.
sentences.chinese: 中国近代史上风云一时的大军阀。

sentences.english: Port Arthur to make China's modern history and the world at large open-air museum.
sentences.chinese: 使旅顺成为中国乃至世界近代史上的露天博物馆。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang Haipeng's main research field is the modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 张海鹏先生的学术研究领域主要是中国近代史。

definition: the not-very-distant past/modern times, excluding recent decades/(in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919)/capitalist times (pre-1949)
Xinhai Revolution (1911), which ended the Qing Dynasty
the late Qing/late 19th and early 20th century China
